item.endrem.old_eye.description: §7§oLegends say this eye once belonged to one of the great Deathworms.
item.endrem.magical_eye.description: §7§oWithout this eye, the Magic has no power.
item.endrem.wither_eye.description: §7§oWishes for the destruction of all. May one day witnessed that destruction.
item.endrem.exotic_eye.description: §7§oLegends say this Eye forms the land upon which many eyes would lay.
